message:
Hey <@&1424461167883194418>! Ready to make some noise? üêù

## üå∏ Weekly Update - 2026-02-11

This week, we're turning your API keys into a full-blown production studio. Video, music, speech‚Äîit's all here.

**üé¨ The Full A/V Studio**
*   **LTX-2 Video Model**: We've added LTX-2, so your text prompts can finally move. 
*   **ElevenMusic**: Drop the beat with the new `elevenmusic` model (duration-based billing).
*   **Whisper Transcription**: Need ears? OVH Whisper is live for top-tier speech-to-text.

**ü§ñ Build Your Own Bot**
*   **Polly Source Code**: Ever wanted to clone me? We released the source code for the **Polly Discord Bot**. Go fork, remix, and deploy your own!
*   **OpenClaw Integration**: New landing page and setup for our friends using OpenClaw.

**‚ú® Quality of Life**
*   **Docs in Play**: We merged the documentation directly into the **Play page**. No more tab-switching‚Äîlearn while you burn (credits).
*   **Smarter Claude**: Upgraded `claude-large` to **Opus 4.6** on Bedrock. Big brain energy.

Go make something loud and moving! üå∏
image_prompt: Pixel art scene of the cute chubby bee mascot wearing large headphones and mixing music on a retro DJ deck. Floating pixel musical notes and film strips. Cozy 8-bit aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes. Text in pixel font: 'A/V STUDIO'. Nostalgic, creative energy.
reasoning: This update focuses heavily on multi-modal capabilities (Audio/Video) which appeals to creators, while the open-sourcing of the bot code is a huge win for the developer community on Discord.
